sentences.en: Adequate doses of atropine can abolish many types of reflex vagal cardiac slowing or asystole.
sentences.cn: 适当剂量的阿托品能消除多种类型的迷走反射性心效减慢或停搏.

sentences.en: An overwhelming majority voted to abolish the brutal punishment.
sentences.cn: 压倒性的大多数投票废除那个残酷的刑罚.

sentences.en: Anti - motilin serum could partly abolish the effects of motilin on MMC.
sentences.cn: 抗 胃动素血清只能部分阻断海马胃动素对十二指肠MMC的影响.

sentences.en: Are they suggesting ( that ) we abolish the Olympic Games?
sentences.cn: 他们建议我们废除奥林匹克运动会 吗 ?

sentences.en: Cure Disease and Abolish Disease range increased to 40 yards.
sentences.cn: 治疗疾病和驱除疾病距离增加到40码.

sentences.en: Dr. Proudie would abolish all forms and ceremonies.
sentences.cn: 普劳迪博士要废除各种仪式与礼节.

sentences.en: Let us keep at our efforts to abolish the draconian ISA.
sentences.cn: 让我们继续斗争以废除残酷的内安法令.

sentences.en: Slavery was abolished in the US in the 19th century.
sentences.cn: 美国于19世纪废除了奴隶制。

sentences.en: St. Francis wanted to sanctify poverty, not to abolish it.
sentences.cn: 圣弗朗西斯想圣化贫困而不是消除它.

sentences.en: The end of law is not abolish or restrain, but to preserve and enlarge freedom.
sentences.cn: 法律的目的不是废除或约束而是维护并扩大自由.

sentences.en: The following year Parliament voted to abolish the death penalty for murder.
sentences.cn: 议会于翌年表决对谋杀罪废除死刑。

sentences.en: The legislature passed a law to aBolish the surtax.
sentences.cn: 立法机关通过了一项废除附加税的法令.

sentences.en: The weapons of war must be abolished before they abolish us.
sentences.cn: 在作战武器消灭我们以前,我们应先把它消灭.

sentences.en: There is growing recognition that we should abolish segregation.
sentences.cn: 我们应该废止种族隔离一事愈来愈受到重视.

sentences.en: This discovery made him abolish the idea of phenomenology eventually.
sentences.cn: 这一发现最终导致了维氏对于现象学的放弃.
我们要消灭掉性的快感.

words.tran_cn: 废奴主义者；废除主义者

trans.tran_en: to officially end a law, system etc, especially one that has existed for a long time

trans.tran_cn: 废除， 废止； 完全破坏
trans.tran_en: to officially end a law, system etc, especially one that has existed for a long time
